content: the pattern will be free for a limited time - because i think we all need a bit of cheering up it s a really relaxing satisfying and soothing knit based on one of barbara walker s mosaic stitch patterns the instructions are both written and charted so you can choose the way you prefer to work there are 2 versions - provisional cast-on and kitchener lots of options for wear as you can rotate the colours - cable cast-on with purl edge and no joining fewer options but no kitchenering ☻ i have listed this is sport weight but you can use fingering sport or dk - or any combination of 2 similar weights the gauge should be about 20st per 4 /20cm but isn t critical - you ll just end up with a snugger or looser cowl
